name: playback
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of playing a recording again in order to hear or see something again: Let's have a playback of those last few frames. Compare
replay noun (RECORDING)See also

the act of listening to or watching something that was previously recorded: [ C ] Each playback will sound as pure as the original.
